description: Detects the execution of suspicious child processes from macOS installer package parent process. This includes osascript, JXA, curl and wget amongst other interpreters
author: Sohan G (D4rkCiph3r)
false_positives: Legitimate software uses the scripts (preinstall, postinstall)
name: Suspicious Installer Package Child Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:("*\/package_script_service" OR "*\/installer") AND process.executable.text:("*\/sh" OR "*\/bash" OR "*\/dash" OR "*\/python" OR "*\/ruby" OR "*\/perl" OR "*\/php" OR "*\/javascript" OR "*\/osascript" OR "*\/tclsh" OR "*\/curl" OR "*\/wget") AND process.command_line.text:("*preinstall*" OR "*postinstall*"))
